Package com.googlecode.jsendnsca.core

Interface Summary
INagiosPassiveCheckSender Interface to be implemented by NagiosPassiveCheckSender's
 

Class Summary
MessagePayload The Passive Check Message Payload
NagiosPassiveCheckSender This class is used to send a Passive Check to the Nagios NSCA add-on
NagiosSettings The settings to use for sending the Passive Check
NonBlockingNagiosPassiveCheckSender This sender does not block unlike the NagiosPassiveCheckSender.
 

Enum Summary
Level  
 

Exception Summary
NagiosException Thrown if an exception is encountered while sending a Passive Check
